info.name: Hide Twitter Analytics Numbers
info.description:
Hiding Tweet Analytics On Your Timeline.
-> a new change of twitter is constantly showing a tweets views at the bottom left of each tweet. if this is annoying or irritating for you, this style will hide it. analytics are still there if you click on a tweet, but is not on the timeline.

combine this style with other styles or copy my code line into your custom styles. no crediting needed.
info.additionalInfo:
i tried to fix this as good as i could now
coding is something i can barely wrap my head around, im not a programmer and only stared at the console of twitter from my browser for hours now. TRYING MY BEST.
after hours and probably 100 changes it hopefully works
